c74object.name: createproject
c74object.digest: Creates a new project folder from a template
c74object.description: The `createproject` object automates project setup. When it receives a `create` message with a destination path, it creates the folder and recursively copies all files from a hardcoded template directory.

inlet.description: Accepts the `create` message followed by the absolute path for the new project.

outlet.description: Outputs diagnostic information when the verbose attribute is enabled.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When enabled (1), the object provides detailed feedback on folder creation and file copying operations.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates the specified directory and copies the template. The parent folder must be named exactly `[Projects]`. Template source: `D:\[Library]\[Audio]\[Works]\[Projects]\[Template]`
